subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin drove away on three restarts over the final 52 laps of the Tums Fast Relief 500, ending Jimmie Johnson’s run of five victories in the previous six races at Martinsville.
snippet: Denny Hamlin drove away on three restarts over the final 52 laps of the Tums Fast Relief 500, ending Jimmie Johnson’s run of five victories in the previous six races at Martinsville.
